name: Revenge of the Dice
description:
It's her time to roll! For years and years, she has witnessed people use her to gamble their life away. But tonight puts an end to it. For a limited period, the dice gain consciousness and use it to seek her revenge on the people who have mercilessly rolled her at the casino. Kill them all and let her be the one to hit the jackpot.

Game created by:

  • Wojciech Niewiadomski - designer
  • Agnieszka Ginalska - level design and tests
  • Dominika Śniegocka - level and sound design
  • Alicja Lechowicz - art design
  • Aleksandra Fajlert - art design
  • Aleksandra Świerczek - developer
  • Dawid Kaluża - developer
